name: Zone of Truth
description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range. Until the spell ends, a creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature cannot speak deliberate lies while in the radius. You know whether each creature succeeds or fails on its saving throw.

effects.description: Creature entering or starting in the zone must make a Charisma save; on failed save it cannot speak deliberate lies while in the area. You know whether each creature succeeds or fails.
